menu_findPermissionCodeByUserId.desc: 查找用户拥有的权限编码

mapper.menu_findPermissionCodeByUserId: SELECT distinct permission_code FROM menus m inner join role_menus rm on rm.menu_id = m.id inner join roles r on r.id = rm.role_id inner join users u on r.id = u.role_id where u.id = :userId and m.type =2

menu_findTabsByUserIdAndParentId.desc: 菜单管理-查询当前菜单下我所拥有的tab页签

mapper.menu_findTabsByUserIdAndParentId: select m.* from menus m inner join role_menus rm on rm.menu_id = m.id inner join users u on u.role_id = rm.role_id where m.is_delete = 0 and u.id = :userId and m.parent_id = :parentId

oplog_page.desc: 操作日志 分页查询

mapper.oplog_page: from OperationLog o where 1=1 <#if account?? && account!=''> and o.account like '%'||:account||'%' </#if> <#if realName?? && realName!=''> and o.realName like '%'||:realName||'%' </#if> <#if orgName?? && orgName!=''> and o.orgName like '%'||:orgName||'%' </#if> <#if module?? && module!=''> and o.module like '%'||:module||'%' </#if> <#if funcName?? && funcName!=''> and o.funcName like '%'||:funcName||'%' </#if> <#if params?? && params!=''> and o.params like '%'||:params||'%' </#if> <#if ip?? && ip!=''> and o.ip like '%'||:ip||'%' </#if> <#if begin?? && end??> and o.createDate between :begin and :end </#if> order by o.createDate desc
mapper.dict_page: from Dictionary o where o.deleted = 0 <#if code?? && code!=''> and o.code = :code </#if> order by o.createDate desc
